safire.data.text_browser module¶

Maps image IDs from an ImagenetCorpus to image files for exploring Safire model performance.

class safire.data.text_browser.TextBrowser(root, corpus, gzipped=True, text2im=None, im2text=None, first_n_sentences=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Provides functionality for looking directly at the texts used to build queries.

create_header(filename)[source]¶

Creates a header for the shown document.

format_representation(word_doc, n_cols=3)[source]¶

Returns a string for printing out the document representation.

Parameters:
  • word_doc – A document representation.
  • n_cols – How many columns should the output have? [NOT IMPL.]
format_text(bow, sentence_buffer, header)[source]¶

Formats the text in the sentence buffer to something printable.

get_multiple_texts(docids, first_n_sentences)[source]¶

Retrieves texts for the given document IDs.

get_representation(docid)[source]¶

Returns how the document is represented by the corpus: the word IDs in the document and their output values.

get_text(docid, first_n_sentences=None)[source]¶

For the given document ID, builds the text to show.

If docid is an integer, will attempt to convert it to filename.

get_word_representation(docid, highest_scoring=None)[source]¶

Returns the document representation with word IDs converted to the original tokens.

If highest_scoring is given, sorts from highest to lowest freq.

parse(filename, first_n_sentences=None)[source]¶

From a vtext filename, retrieves the raw text of the document, grouped by sentence.

show(docid, first_n_sentences=None)[source]¶

Load the given text in a separate window.

show_multiple(docids, first_n_sentences=None)[source]¶

Load the given set of texts in a separate window.

text_to_window(text)[source]¶

Opens a new window and prints the formatted text there.
